sentences.sContent: When the child see all the room fille with stranger he is much abash.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the child see all the room fille with stranger he is much abash.
sentences.sCn: 那小孩一看到满屋子都是陌生人，感到非常局促不安。

sentences.sContent: When the child see all the room fille with stranger, he is much abash .
sentences.sContent_eng: When the child see all the room fille with stranger, he is much abash .
sentences.sCn: 中文翻译：那小孩一看到满屋子都是陌生人， 感到非常局促不安。

synos.tran: 使困窘；使羞愧；使局促不安

remMethod.val: ab + ash (灰) → 中间有灰， 灰头灰脸 → 使尴尬

trans.tranCn: 使局促不安， 使困窘
